entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
